description: MainActivity.kt implements the main screen for a Tic Tac Toe Android app, managing UI setup, game logic, user interactions, styling, and animations.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity is the entry point of the Tic Tac Toe application, handling game state, UI interactions, and styling.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, binds views, and sets up the game UI and interactions.

methods.name: styleHeader
methods.description: Applies styles to header elements for visual consistency.

methods.name: setInitialTexts
methods.description: Sets initial UI texts for game status and turn indicators.

methods.name: wireCellClicks
methods.description: Sets click listeners for each cell button.

methods.name: wireReset
methods.description: Binds reset button to reset game state.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles cell click events, updates game state, and checks for win/draw conditions.

methods.name: pulse
methods.description: Applies a brief pulse animation to a UI view.

methods.name: applyIntroFade
methods.description: Animates the activity's root view with a fade-in effect to soften entrance.

methods.name: updateTurnText
methods.description: Updates the display for which player's turn it is.

methods.name: togglePlayer
methods.description: Switches the current player between 'X' and 'O'.

methods.name: isBoardFull
methods.description: Checks if all cells are occupied, indicating a draw if no winner.

methods.name: checkWin
methods.description: Determines whether the specified player has a winning combination.

methods.name: highlightWin
methods.description: Provides visual feedback when a player wins.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game board and UI to start a new match.
